creditline: The Katherine Kittredge McMillan Memorial Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
medium: Zinc alloy; cast, engraved, and inlaid with silver and brass
text: This water vase (lota) is inlaid with silver and brass, a combination which is known as ganga-jamuna, referring to the two colors of India's major north Indian rivers, the Ganges and the Yamuna.
title: Water Vase (Lota)
